featured.text: The dead material and waste matter form the diet of a group of living organisms called decomposers.
The decomposers are a vital link in the natural cycle of life and death.

definition.zh_def: 分解者，指能將有機物質分解成更簡單化合物的生物，通常包括細菌和真菌。
definition.en_def: An organism, such as bacteria or fungi, that breaks down dead organic material, returning nutrients to the ecosystem.
definition.example: Decomposers play a crucial role in recycling nutrients in the ecosystem.
